content:
The scene opens with Andy sitting in a disabled toilet, making suspicious noises. He has been in there for hours, despite there being no obvious disability. Suddenly, the door bursts open and John storms in.

John: "Andy, what the hell are you doing in here? You've been in here for hours!"

Andy: (nervously) "Uh, I was just, uh, practicing my presentation for the school talent show. You know, to make sure it's perfect."

John: (skeptical) "In the disabled toilet? And making those noises? That doesn't sound right, Andy."

Andy: (defensively) "I was just trying to add some extra drama to my presentation, okay? Don't judge me!"

John: (sighing) "Andy, you can't just use the disabled toilet for your own personal gain. It's not right. And those noises you were making were disturbing."

Andy: (sheepishly) "Sorry, John. I didn't mean to cause any trouble."

John: (frustrated) "Just get out of here and try to be more considerate in the future."

The scene ends with Andy quickly gathering his things and rushing out of the disabled toilet, embarrassed.
